coreAttributes.authorTag: A tag sewn to the inside of the bra reads 'Made by Blue999'
coreAttributes.name: nursing bra
coreAttributes.description: This nursing bra provides additional support to lactating breasts, and has specially designed cups which can be opened to expose the wearer's nipples.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(clip)] the cups of [npc.her] nursing bra back up to cover [npc.her] [npc.nipples].
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(clip)] the cups of [npc2.namePos] nursing bra back up to cover [npc.her] [npc.nipples].
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(clip)] the cups of [npc2.namePos] nursing bra back up to cover [npc.her] [npc.nipples].

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unclip)] the cups of [npc.her] nursing bra and pulls them down, exposing [npc.her] [npc.nipples+].
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unclip)] the cups of [npc2.namePos] nursing bra and pulls them down, exposing [npc2.her] [npc2.nipples+].
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unclip)] the cups of [npc2.namePos] nursing bra and pulls them down, exposing [npc2.her] [npc2.nipples+].
